text: 3.2: Ro 8.18; 8.29; 1 Ko 15.49; 2 Ko 3.18; Fi 3.21; Kor 3.4; 2 Pi 1.4Nde nan kɨvntogi, nza ntige Fhe Bakɨmen tari ki. Nza zumgum ramgi kɨrɨ tɨvar muuŋrie? Nza tuituigiap ne kaŋgi fhuvara, ne ntigar kɨrar hɨrga. Nza khueŋ kaŋgi, Zisas Krais, ana zumgum guigira kɨrar hɨgɨrga, nza guigira ana ganɨp, nza guigira ana kaŋgip, nza ara farar muuŋgirga.
